import React, { Component } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../style/Login.css"; class SignIn extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this); } componentWillMount() { this.props.handler(); } onSubmit() { let history = useHistory(); history.push("/dashboard"); } render() { return (
Hello,Friend!
Enter your personal details and start journey with us
SIGN UP
Create Account
); } } export default SignIn;
